page.title: 01PLUCKLEY AND LITTLE CHART
page.content: The area to be covered consists of 2 villages, Pluckley and Little Chart with their combined population of just over 1,000. The village of Pluckley lies to north-west of Ashford. The main road through the village is the B2O77 which runs from the A20 London to Dover road at Charing to the village of Smarden. Pluckley is built on the greensand ridge with panoramic views across the Weald. The countryside is farmland given to crops,grazing and orchards with a few light industries. The village centres around The Street in which stands the church, the local school and the haunted Black Horse pub. The area has a reputation for being the most haunted village in Kent.
